snippet: The work of the economist and sociologist Lucius Burckhardt and the British architect Cedric Price will be the subject of the pavilion at the 14th International Architecture Exhibition.
abstract: The work of the economist and sociologist Lucius Burckhardt and the British architect Cedric Price will be the subject of the pavilion at the 14th International Architecture Exhibition.

headline.main: An Architect and a Sociologist to be Honored at Swiss Pavilion in Venice
